committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution designating the poem "Humanity Above All Nations" the Bicentennial Prayer for Peace.

summary.text: Designates the poem, entitled "Humanity Above All Nations," written by Rebecca Shelley, of Battle Creek, Michigan, as the "Bicentennial Prayer for Peace."

titles.title: Joint resolution designating the poem "Humanity Above All Nations" the Bicentennial Prayer for Peace.
